Articles.Content:
Because of now rapid development of trains I decided to make a new one, a streamliner. The M-10000:

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z8dLY6K.png[/img]
This was one of the first diesel streamliners for Union Pacific. It has a consist that is really, just one train car![img]http://i.imgur.com/3VTVdGc.png[/img]
The cars were permanently connected, but the locomotive could be un-coupled.[img]http://i.imgur.com/R7OexYW.png[/img]
It has a pretty decent IVA:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ek0TuLw.png[/img]

It's main competitor, the Burlington Zephyr coming probably in the afternoon!
